Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to the sale of private-label liquor at retail for consumption off the premises
Summary: Authorizes the sale of private-label liquor at retail for consumption off the premises by certain licensed distillers; requires the labels of such private-label liquors to indicate that the distiller is licensed in New York state; requires reporting.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the alcoholic beverage control law, in relation to the sale of private-label liquor at retail for consumption off the premises
